name: Banaras Peda
description: Rich and sweet peda from Banaras, known for its smooth texture.
longDescription: Made from condensed milk, sugar, and cardamom, Banaras peda is a traditional Indian sweet with a melt-in-the-mouth experience.
instructions: Store in a cool, dry place. Consume within 7 days.
expertTips: Warm slightly before serving for enhanced flavor.
shippingDetails: Ships in 1-2 business days. Packed in food-safe material.

name: Basundi
description: A creamy dessert made from thickened sweetened milk.
longDescription: Basundi is flavored with cardamom and garnished with nuts, perfect for festive occasions.
instructions: Refrigerate after opening. Best consumed within 3 days.
shippingDetails: Delivered in insulated packaging to maintain freshness.

name: Bebinca
description: Traditional Goan layered dessert made with coconut milk and eggs.
longDescription: Bebinca has multiple layers baked to perfection, offering a caramelized coconut flavor.
instructions: Store in a cool place. Do not refrigerate.

name: Chocolate Bebinca
description: A chocolate twist to the classic Goan Bebinca.
longDescription: Rich chocolate infused layers make this dessert even more indulgent.
instructions: Store in a cool place. Avoid refrigeration.

name: Fruit Shrikhand
description: Creamy yogurt-based dessert with fresh fruit.
longDescription: A fusion of traditional shrikhand and seasonal fruits, perfect for summer.

name: Gujiya
description: Crispy fried pastry stuffed with sweet khoya and nuts.
longDescription: A popular Holi sweet, gujiya has a flaky crust with a rich, sweet filling.
instructions: Store in airtight container. Consume within 5 days.

name: Mawa Gujia
description: A richer version of gujiya stuffed with extra khoya.
longDescription: Mawa gujiya is stuffed with sweetened khoya and nuts for a luxurious taste.

name: Kesar Peda
description: Saffron-infused peda with rich aroma and taste.
longDescription: A royal sweet made from milk solids, sugar, and premium saffron strands, offering a luxurious flavor.
instructions: Store in a cool, dry place. Consume within 7 days.
expertTips: Slightly warm before serving for a rich aroma.

name: Mawa Modak
description: Soft modak made from sweetened khoya.
longDescription: Traditional offering for Ganesh Chaturthi, these modaks are made with rich mawa and cardamom.
expertTips: Serve chilled or at room temperature.

name: Modak
description: Steamed or fried dumplings with sweet coconut filling.
longDescription: A festive sweet dumpling, loved for its soft texture and aromatic coconut-jaggery filling.
instructions: Consume fresh on the same day for best taste.

name: Mohanthal
description: Gujarati gram flour fudge with ghee and sugar.
longDescription: Traditional festive sweet made from roasted gram flour, rich in ghee and nuts.
instructions: Store in a cool, dry place.
expertTips: Serve warm for a richer flavor.

name: Mom's Love
longDescription: A curated box of assorted Indian sweets that feel like home.
instructions: Store in a cool place. Consume within 5 days.
shippingDetails: Comes in a gift box with ribbon.

name: Mom's Magic
description: A sweet treat inspired by traditional recipes.
longDescription: Special sweets prepared with love, reminiscent of home-cooked desserts.
expertTips: Serve with tea for a perfect evening snack.

name: Shrikhand
longDescription: Thick, creamy, and flavored with cardamom and saffron, shrikhand is a classic dessert.

name: Sutarfeni
description: Crisp, flaky sweet made from fine vermicelli.
longDescription: Light and airy sweet garnished with pistachios, often enjoyed during festivals.
instructions: Store in airtight container. Keep away from moisture.
expertTips: Serve with warm milk for a unique twist.
